article_title: Gap Says Its Main Unit Has a Ways to Go
article_text:
It could be another year of mending for Gap Inc.’s namesake brand.

After reporting a 10% drop in Gap same-store sales, which dragged down the broader company’s results for the quarter ended May 2, Chief Executive Art Peck said improvements might not be visible until next spring. That is because much of the merchandise for earlier seasons was...

twitter.description: Gap Inc. said improvements at its namesake unit might not be visible until next spring as it works through inventory ordered before new leadership was installed. The retailer said profit fell 8% in the latest quarter.
twitter.title: Gap Says Its Main Unit Has a Ways to Go

It could be another year of mending for Gap Inc.’s namesake brand.
